Name: Papa's Quiz
About the game: Papaâ€™s Quiz is a party game for 1-8 players. Use phones or tablets as controllers and compete in multiple question types, where the smartest and fastest player will be the last standing victor! Create your avatar, and give it a fun name! Dress it up with creative clothes and use it to express your victories in the game. Give the other players a good fight for which category to play. Tap, tap, tap to win! Choose your dance moves to express your good fortune.
